Smart cat

Morning activity;

Lucifer was not ordinary cat.With her wide open golden eyes and a tiny pink tounge,
It does many activeties every morning such as:

  1. Climbing over the trees.
  2. Running crossing the streets.
  3. Jumping through the windows.

At the day-time

Lucifer is very active, it walks around the neighbourhood playing with other neighbours' cats.
Then she contineus her entertainment theough the park where as there a lot of people and their kids.
one day there was with her tow kids ; a boy and a girl.
The girl was trying to convince her mother to take the Lucifer home,
because she was so adorable. However her mother was sure that was someone's cat
,but her mother promised her that she will get her own kity.

During the night

After a day full of excitement and joy Lucifer returns her home
, wich is woderfull and worm. She enjoys her night ther.
